{{Outdated}}
{{exclusive|bedrock|education}}

'''Developer commands''' are generally only enabled in the development and testing environment of the game. In release versions, players cannot see and execute these commands.

However, these developer exclusive commands were accidentally left in the iOS release of [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.13]]. They were removed in [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.14]].<ref>https://twitter.com/MattGartzke/status/981691403716648960</ref><ref>https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004167311-Minecraft-1-2-14-iOS-Only-</ref>
